# Presentation - UofT - reproducibility 

## General overview

This repo contains the presentation to introduce some theoretical and concepts about reproducibility in research. This presentation is paired with the material [here](https://gabrielnakamura.github.io/Workshop_UofT/). Please check it out to some instructions on how to download and install git in your computer (if you don't have it yet).

The presentation can be freely accessed [here](https://gabrielnakamura.github.io/presentation_git_UofT/)
